short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to override your new tab page with bcar.fun

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BCAr is an extension to override your new tab page with the BCAr.fun web page. BCA doesn't seem to be able to put its links all in one place, so I did it for them!
